ForecastingTypeSource.name: ForecastingTypeSource
ForecastingTypeSource.description: Maps a forecasting source definition to a forecast type.

DeveloperName.description: The developer name of the forecasting type source.

ForecastingSourceDefinitionId.description: ID of the forecasting source definition. This field is a relationship field.

ForecastingTypeId.description: ID of the forecast type. Can be linked only to forecast types created in Summer â€™21 and later. This field is a relationship field.

Language.description: Language of the forecasting type source.

MasterLabel.description: Required. Controlling label for this forecasting type source.

ParentSourceDefinitionId.description: For forecast types not based on the opportunity object and not based on a custom measure, this value represents the parent ForecastingSourceDefinition of the linked ForecastingSourceDefinition. This field is a relationship field. Opportunity Product is the parent of Opportunity. Opportunity Split is the parent of Opportunity. Line Item Schedule is the parent of Opportunity Product.

RelationField.description: Represents the field linking the source objects of the parent ForecastingSourceDefinition to the child ForecastingSourceDefinition.Possible values are: OpportunityLineItem.OpportunityId OpportunityLineItem.Product2Id OpportunityLineItemSchedule.OpportunityLineItemId OpportunitySplit.OpportunityId

SourceGroup.description: Required. Represents a grouping of forecasting source definitions.
